{"id":1206862977,"question_id":3313,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1710734108,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"348 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1206862977/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Strength of K Disjoint Subarrays","memory":"140.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long maximumStrength(int[] nums, int k) {\n        int n = nums.length;\n        int[] arr = new int[n+1];\n        System.arraycopy(nums, 0, arr, 1, n);\n        nums = arr;\n\n        long[][][] dp = new long[n+1][k+1][2];\n        for(int i=0; i<=n; i++){\n            for(int j=0; j<=k; j++){\n                Arrays.fill(dp[i][j], Long.MIN_VALUE/3);\n            }\n        }\n\n        for (int i=0; i<=n; i++)\n        {\n            dp[i][0][0] = 0;\n        }\n\n\n        for (int i=1; i<=n; i++)\n            for (int j=1; j<=k; j++)\n            {\n                if (j%2==0)\n                {\n                    dp[i][j][0] = Math.max(dp[i-1][j][0], dp[i-1][j][1]);\n                    dp[i][j][1] = Math.max(dp[i-1][j][1], Math.max(dp[i-1][j-1][0], dp[i-1][j-1][1])) - (long)nums[i]*(k+1-j);                                        \n                }\n                else\n                {\n                    dp[i][j][0] = Math.max(dp[i-1][j][0], dp[i-1][j][1]);\n                    dp[i][j][1] = Math.max(dp[i-1][j][1], Math.max(dp[i-1][j-1][0], dp[i-1][j-1][1])) + (long)nums[i]*(k+1-j);\n                }                \n            }\n        \n        return Math.max(dp[n][k][0], dp[n][k][1]);\n                \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-strength-of-k-disjoint-subarrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
